# stencilResolveFilter

**Instance Property**

The filter used for stencil multisample resolve.

## Declaration

```swift
var stencilResolveFilter: MTLMultisampleStencilResolveFilter { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLMultisampleStencilResolveFilter/sample0].
